talk.author: did:plc:p46ee7hkuabgsmr23joifodm
talk.utter: I’m not up for a French style exodus 😂. But I do wish that if they really must stay, then they should be slimmed down to the bare minimum (Monarch & heir only) have only one state maintained HQ and minimal state costs.

talk.author: did:plc:pofyayl4onobi7mhumezdtlh
talk.utter: Exodus is a polite way of putting it. When in history has anyone of wealth willingly surrendered their wealth? That's a fairytale

talk.author: did:plc:p46ee7hkuabgsmr23joifodm
talk.utter: The difference here is they are propped up by the state. It’s not wholly their wealth, it’s ours as a nation.

talk.author: did:plc:p46ee7hkuabgsmr23joifodm
talk.utter: The difference here is they are propped up by the state. It’s not wholly their wealth, it’s ours as a nation.

talk.author: did:plc:pofyayl4onobi7mhumezdtlh
talk.utter: Well by all means go take your money off them there.

talk.author: did:plc:p46ee7hkuabgsmr23joifodm
talk.utter: You know the point I was making. Other countries have become republics, it can be done. Let’s not forget you’re the one posting images of guillotines. Weird. So 👋🏻.
